block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across Connecticut this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the Connecticut Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to ctcivic@nytimes.com.
State of Connecticut

Branford Connecticut Department of Environmental Protection public hearing on an application for a permit to construct a residential dock. Tuesday at 6 p.m. Branford Community Recreation Center, 46 Church Street. (860) 424-3037. Hartford Hearing on an application to construct a residential dock. Wednesday at noon. Connecticut Department of Environmental Protection Headquarters, 79 Elm Street. (860) 424-3037. Hartford Connecticut Commission on Culture and Tourism. Monday at 1:30 p.m. 1 Financial Plaza, 755 Main Street. (860) 256-2727. New Britain Energy and Telecommunications. Thursday at 1:30 p.m. Siting Council, 10 Franklin Square. (860) 827-2935.
Fairfield County

Bethel Public Utilities Commission. Monday at 4 p.m. Clifford J. Hurgin Municipal Center, 1 School Street. (203) 794-8501. Bethel Public Site and Building Committee. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Clifford J. Hurgin Municipal Center, 1 School Street. (203) 794-8501. Danbury Common Council. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Danbury City Hall, 155 Deer Hill Avenue. (203) 797-4500. Fairfield Board of Selectmen. Wednesday at 4:30 p.m. Fairfield Town Hall, 611-725 Old Post Road. (203) 256-3000. Newtown Board of Police Commissioners. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Newtown Town Hall South, 3 Main Street. (203) 426-6470. Redding Water Pollution Control Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Redding Town Hall, 100 Hill Road. (203) 938-2002. Ridgefield Fire Commission. Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. Ridgefield Town Hall, 400 Main Street. (203) 431-2700. Trumbull Zoning Board of Appeals. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Trumbull Town Hall, 5866 Main Street. (203) 452-5000. Weston Conservation Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Weston Town Hall, 56 Norfield Road. (203) 222-2656. Weston Planning and Zoning Commission. Monday at 8 p.m. Weston Town Hall, 56 Norfield Road. (203) 222-2656. Wilton Conservation Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Wilton Town Hall, 238 Danbury Road. (203) 563-0100.
Hartford County

Simsbury Historic District Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Simsbury City Hall, 933 Hopmeadow Street. (860) 658-3200. Windsor Youth Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Windsor Town Hall, 275 Broad Street. (860) 285-1902.
Litchfield County

Barkhamsted Conservation Commission. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Barkhamsted Town Hall, 67 Ripley Hill Road. (860) 379-8285. Colebrook Inland Wetlands Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Colebrook Town Hall, Colebrook Center. (860) 379-3359. Falls Village Inland Wetland and Conservation Commission. Thursday at 7 p.m. Canaan Town Hall, 108 Main Street. (860) 824-0707. Plymouth Conservation and Inland Wetlands Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Plymouth Town Hall, 80 Main Street. (860) 585-4001. Roxbury Board of Selectmen. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Roxbury Town Hall, 29 North Street. (860) 354-9938. Washington Conservation Commission. Wednesday at 5 p.m. Washington Town Hall, 2 Bryan Plaza. (860) 868-2259. Woodbury Planning Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Shove Building, 281 Main Street South. (203) 263-2144.
Middlesex County

Chester Park and Recreation Commission. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Chester Town Hall, 203 Middlesex Avenue. (860) 526-0013. Portland Senior Tax Relief Task Force. Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. Portland Library, 20 Freestone Avenue. (860) 342-6770.
New Haven County

Madison Rockland Preserve Committee. Friday at 7:30 a.m. Madison Town Campus, 8 Campus Drive. (203) 245-5672. Orange Zoning Board of Appeals. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Orange Town Hall, 617 Orange Center Road. (203) 891-2122.
New London County

Lebanon Economic Development Commission. Thursday at 10 a.m. Lebanon Town Hall, 579 Exeter Road. (860) 642-7319. Stonington Stormwater Task Force. Monday at 1 p.m. Stonington Town Hall, 152 Elm Street. (860) 535-5060.
Tolland County

Andover Board of Selectmen. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Old Firehouse, Center Street. (860) 742-7305. Tolland Inland Wetlands Commission public hearing. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
Windham County

Danielson Inland Wetlands and Watercourses Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Killingly Town Hall, 172 Main Street. (860) 779-5300. Willimantic Board of Selectmen. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Windham Town Hall, 979 Main Street. (860) 465-3000.
